snippet: Horizon Pharma said it was willing to pay $33 a share for its smaller American rival, up from its previous offer of $29.25 a share.
abstract: DealBook Online; Irish drug maker Horizon Pharma increases unsolicited offer for Depomed to $33 per share, representing 60 percent premium over closing price.
lead_paragraph: Horizon Pharma said it was willing to pay $33 a share for its smaller American rival, up from its previous offer of $29.25 a share.

headline.main: Drug Maker Depomed Skeptical of Horzon Pharma’s Latest Bid
